		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{ vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,

		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		fact_filter as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		cout_standard_cd_ as string,
		cout_fabrication as string,
		cout_standard_livr_ as string,
		cout_standard_factur_ as string,

		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventedirecte
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> comptesap
source(output(
		{Cl� R�f�rentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Cl� EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal d�but} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{D�partement} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refAtc
ventedirecte derive(distributeur = "vente directe",
		{Diffus/chantier} = iif( {Canal distribution}=="43", "Chantier", "Diffus"),
		{marque(SD/vaillant)} = iif({ Org. commerciale}=="1604", "SaunierDuval", "Vaillant")) ~> addCols
comptesap select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> projection
projection aggregate(groupBy(Client,
		{Code postal}),
	{Agence commerciale} = max({Agence commerciale})) ~> dropDuplicade
removeCol1, dropDuplicade join({Code client} == Client,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> sapJoin
addCols select(mapColumn(
		{Org commerciale} = { Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Code client} = {Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		Article = reference,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		{Diffus/chantier},
		{marque(SD/vaillant)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> removeCol1
sapJoin, atcDropDuplicate join({Diffus/chantier} == {Canal final}
	&& {Code postal} == code_postal_atc
	&& {marque(SD/vaillant)} == Marque,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinAtc
refAtc select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy({Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Marque,
		ATC,
		NomATC),
	Matricule = max(Matricule)) ~> atcDropDuplicate
setQteCA select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org commerciale},
		marque_name = {marque(SD/vaillant)},
		canal_final = {Diffus/chantier},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		POSSAMidString = {Code client},
		reference = Article,
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Motif commande},
		yearmonth,
		distributeur,
		{Code postal},
		{Agence commerciale} = {Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> removeCol2
joinAtc derive(ca_final = {CA facturé},
		qt_final = {Qté facturée},
		data_origin = "facturation") ~> setQteCA
removeCol2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TUTO_OUTPUT2.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> oVenteDirect

source(output(
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Coopérative} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{CA 2020} as string,
		{CA 2019} as string,
		{Qte 2020} as string,
		{Qte 2019} as string,
		path as string,
		qte_ecoulement as double,
		Famille as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		REFFOURNISSEUR as string,
		{Qte Livrée 2020} as string,
		{Qte Livrée 2019} as string,
		{Code Dispo Cde} as string,
		{Code SAPAIG} as string,
		{CA sans Marge} as string,
		{CA sans Marge A-1} as string,
		{Evol. CA A/A-1} as string,
		{Qte Livrée} as string,
		{Qte Livrée A-1} as string,
		{Evol. Qte A/A-1} as string,
		{Qté Livrée 2020} as string,
		{Qté Livrée 2019} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
getYearmonth derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Coopérative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid),
	POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid)) ~> unique
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> leftOuter
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonth@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& REFFOURNISSEUR == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month) ~> yearmonth
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt� vente directe})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonth@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& REFFOURNISSEUR == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
enleverVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		Fournisseur = marque_file,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth = yearmonth@yearmonth,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		yearmonth = ventesDirectes@yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endVenteDirete
outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth = yearmonth@yearmonth,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		yearmonth = ventesDirectes@yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3, endVenteDirete union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		{Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		Article,
		{Code client},
		{Qt� vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 derive(year = substring(yearmonth,1,4),
		marque_id = iif(lower(marque_file)=="vaillant", 1621, 1604)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Fournisseur,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive(year = replace(split(path, " ")[5], ".xlsx", ""),
		month = split(path, " ")[4]) ~> getYearmonth
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OUTPUT
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound

		{Référence} = iif(substring({Référence},1,2) == "00", substring({Référence},3,length({Référence})-2), {Référence})) ~> canalDiffus

		DateOffre = toDate(split( split(DateOffre, " ")[1] , '/')[1] +"/"+ iif(length(split( split(DateOffre, " ")[1] , '/')[2])==2, split( split(DateOffre, " ")[1] , '/')[2], "0"+split( split(DateOffre, " ")[1] , '/')[2])+"/"+split( split(DateOffre, " ")[1] , '/')[3], "dd/mm/yyyy")) ~> typeCast

		{Référence} = iif(substring({Référence},1,2) == "00", substring({Référence},3,length({Référence})-2), {Référence})) ~> canalChantier

source(output(
		{Représentant} as string,

		WholeSalerID as string,

		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
rename derive(yearmonth = regexExtract(fileName , '(\\d+)'),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
yearmonth derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5 ,2)) ~> yearAndMonth
yearAndMonth filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
yearAndMonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
ecoulement derive({Représentant} = toString(byName('Représentant')),
		{N° Département} = toString(byName('N° Département')),
		{Département} = toString(byName('Département')),
		{Libellé point de vente} = toString(byName('Libellé point de vente')),
		{N° Siret} = toString(byName('N° Siret')),
		{Année livraison} = toString(byName('Année livraison')),
		{Réference} = toString(byName('Réference')),
		{Qte en unité de vente} = toString(byName('Qte en unité de vente'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		{Code point de vente},
		{Code Depot source},
		{Code client},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		Ville,
		{Mois livraison},
		{code fournisseur},
		{fournisseur principal},
		{Code produit},
		produit,
		{Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		{N° Département},
		{Département},
		{Libellé point de vente},
		{N° Siret},
		{Année livraison},
		{Réference},
		qte_ecoulement = {Qte en unité de vente},
		fileName = path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Code point de vente})) ~> codePointVenteNotNull
organisation derive(POSid = trim(POSid, " "),
		HubSAPid = trim(HubSAPid, " ")) ~> cleansing
cleansing filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
posidNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth_right = yearmonth,
		Article,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté ventes directes} = {Qt� vente directe}
	),

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameVentesDirectes

	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes

	&& {Réference} == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qté ventes directes})) ~> enleverVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(yearmonth) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerleftVentesDirectes
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		{Code postal},
		marque_file = {fournisseur principal},
		article = produit,
		ca_ecoulement = {Montant prv net},
		{Représentant},
		departement_id = {N° Département},
		reference = {Réference},
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		UnitID,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
enleverVentesDirectes, outerleftVentesDirectes union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion

		distributeur = "vf_confort") ~> Addcolumn
codePointVenteNotNull, organisation join({Code point de vente} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNULL

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

properties.description:
o	Pour le cout
	Prendre la facturation « brute » en sortie de SAP/BW
	Filtrer les lignes ou le donneur d’ordre est un CTT
•	Question 2bis (cf plus haut) : il semblerait que nous ayons besoin ID du CTT ?
	Filtrer certaines raisons de commandes et de types de document
•	Question 3 : pouvez-vous nous transmettre le détail des filtres svp ?
	La colonne de cout en sortie sera le « cout standard » présent dans la facturation 
	Ajouter l’information de VMC (en euros) en faisant la jointure en avec le nouveau référentiel VMC (info non dispo dans l’extract à date BW)
	Ajouter les méta données produits, client, CTT, comme dans la base commerciale

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared afctationflows = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_affectation_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared atcc2021 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_c2021_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = afctationflows,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"Clé Référentiel", "Marque", "Code Postal début", "Code Postal fin", "Utilisateur", "Fonction", "Département", "DR"})
in
  #"Choose columns";

		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		toroll
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> torolltoList
torolltoList window(over(yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		{Qté facturée} = iif(toDouble({Qté facturée})<=0, -1, 1)) ~> newColumns
newColumns derive({CA facturé} = {Qté facturée}*abs({CA facturé})) ~> CAfacture
typecaste filter(isNull({Qté facturée})) ~> quantityNULL
quantityNULL derive({CA facturé} = toDouble(ca_factur_),
		indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+"null",
		{Qté facturée} = toInteger({Qté facturée})) ~> qteNullFacturaction
CAfacture, qteNullFacturaction union(byName: true)~> UnionQteNullFacturation
